description:
Deep in the Jungles of Mexico you can find Pablo Escobar's abandoned drug plane. No one knows the circumstances why it crashed in Yucatan, Mexico. We take a 3 day trek into the unknown to see if we can uncover the mystery. 

TRIBAL RITES ADVENTURE RETREATS: https://www.fearlessandfar.com/trips

Big thanks to Arturo for helping me put this together, contact him for adventures in the Yucatan! https://www.instagram.com/tours_sukun/

#fearlessandfar #mexico #travel #adventure 

Watch my TOP ADVENTURE VIDEOS
✦ RAIDING a BABOON CAMP With HUNTER GATHERERS - https://youtu.be/Ny4bHOnSg0o
✦ A WEEK with the DEATH TRIBE of INDONESIA: https://youtu.be/Oc-wS-qG0_A
✦ Painful RITES of PASSAGE with the MURSI TRIBE: https://youtu.be/PL45FQyYq8w
✦ LOST IN CONGO and Trading a CROC for a Bed: https://youtu.be/63jORqZ3WBE
✦ SOLO Camping in Satan’s Castle Gone Wrong (Shots Fired) https://youtu.be/v0TdYJ653W0

WHO AM I?
Welcome to Fearless & Far, the most adventurous channel on YouTube. I'm Mike Corey, Adven
title: Exploring ESCOBAR'S Drug Plane (What's Inside?)

description:
Skeeter Ray is known as the Godfather of the bayou. I sat Skeeter down for a quick interview to see if he could give any advice about life, love, and how to be happy in this crazy crazy world!

#louisiana #cajun #travel
title: How To Be Happy!
